p: The rHCoVs-OC43 50% tissue culture infectious dose (TCID 50) was determined by indirect immunofluorescence assay (IFA) according to a previously described method ( Reed, 1938). Briefly, BHK-21 cells in 96-well plates were inoculated with serial 10-fold dilutions of virus, and virus-infected cells were incubated with anti-OC43-N mouse polyclonal antibodies at 72-h post -infection. Goat anti-mouse IgG (A28175) antibodies were used as the secondary antibody.
